name: Ferienwohnung Moroder
description: Holiday apartment in a private house, centrally located, close to the Penken lifts, adventure swimming pool, tennis courts and ice skating rink, as well near by the Minigolf and the forest. Ski bus stop just in frent of the house, own car park.
Included in price: Electricity, heating, water, excluded: Bed linen and towels (Euro 16.- per person), a final cleaning charge of 47.- Euro.

Check in: 14.00hr / Check out: 10.00hr.
You will reach Mayrhofen using the B169. Go straigh ahead at the roundabout, past the railway station, let at Einfahrt Mitte, straight over at the next junction. At the next junction by the "Rundum Café" turn right. The Moroder holiday apartment can be found almost immediately on the right.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet
makesOffer.description: 3 room apartment with bathroom/WC/double hand basin, kitchen with electric hobs, radio, TV, DVD-player, oven, large fridge. Balcony, ski store. 1 bedroom with a double and a single bed, 1 bedroom with double bed, sofa in lounge. Centrally located, close to the lift stations, swimming pool, mini golf, forest and shops, ski bus stop outside the front door. Shopping very close!
